comments.comment: Atta kathawa obata devi bihitai b.s.ai anith ewunta bari wune paduwe idala wenna yana parikshanayak  qenna denna.ai sadda nathiwa inna bari.okunnokkoma alekata gahapu  game eliwena nisa kohoma hari oka nawattanna gin ranilath ekka gahapu  gamw eka.anika masyakin kiyala kiyanne kohimada.ehenam anith parikshana walatath kalayak deela kiyannna pukuwanne e kaale iwar wunama meka iwarai kiyala.ehenam hamotama iya de wenna puluwanda?whema kalayak kiyann abaha okkoma hoyala  wade keewnakan bala hitapalla.ubalata bari wunane kalayak niyama jaranna  badumkareta.ano kaei ain wina muslim kari anthawadi deshapkayeni  thopi oya hadanne apiwa awussaganna sadda nathiwa game eka gasswaganna anduqe ina ponnayorika alle natewata apiwa thopita baha natwanna api ekathiwela thopiwa wata karala wlaaala thamai passa balanne thawath dagalanna haduwoth larnne.edata media wi fi mokuth nathiwei ekanisa parissamin budu saranai ape rayata un okkoma wallailama pala kunuwela pala ratata hena adina ratata wina karana okkomalawa.saaadu saaadu saaaadu
comments.author: Amith Munasinghe
